Title: An Act Changing the Name of Jose Abad Santos Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Jose Abad Santos, Province of Davao Del Sur, to Tomas Lachica District Hospital
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 813
An Act Changing the Name of Jose Abad Santos Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Jose Abad Santos, Province of Davao Del Sur, to Tomas Lachica District Hospital
Section 1. The name of Jose Abad Santos Emergency Hospital in the Municipality of Jose Abad Santos, Province of Davao del Sur, is hereby changed to Tomas Lachica District Hospital.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1awp++i1
Approved: April 27, 1984
